TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Concussive Shot
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the duration of your Concussive Shot's daze effect by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Focused Aim
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Steady Shot by [@value]%, and increases your chance to hit by [@value2]% and increases your chance to hit with ranged and meele attacks by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Lethal Shots
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Careful Aim
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your ranged attack power by an amount equal to [@value]% of your total Intellect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Hunters Mark
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the bonus attack power granted by your Hunter's Mark ability by [@value]%, and reduces the mana cost of your Hunter's Mark ability by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mortal Shots
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your ranged abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Go for the Throat
TalentsTiers.Description: Your ranged critical hits cause your pet to generate [@value] Focus.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Arcane Shot
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Arcane Shot by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Aimed Shot
TalentsTiers.Description:
6% of base mana
5-35 yd range

Instant Cast
10 sec cooldown

Requires Ranged Weapon
An aimed shot that increases ranged damage by 408 and reduces healing done to that target by 50%. Lasts 10 sec.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Rapid Killing
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Rapid Fire ability by [@value3] min.  In addition, after killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, your next Aimed Shot, Arcane Shot or Chimera Shot causes [@value]% additional damage.  Lasts [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Stings
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting and Wyvern Sting by [@value]% and the mana drained by your Viper Sting by [@value2]%. In addition, reduces the chance your Sting over time damage will be dispelled by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Efficiency
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Shots and Stings by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Concussive Barrage
TalentsTiers.Description: Your successful Chimera Shot and Multi-Shot attacks have a [@value]% chance to Daze the target for [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Readiness
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
3 min cooldown

When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown of your other Hunter abilities, except Bestial Wrath.

TalentsTiers.Name: Barrage
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot, Aimed Shot, and Volley spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Combat Experience
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Agility and Intellect by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ranged Weapon Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases all damage you deal when a ranged weapons is equipped by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Piercing Shots
TalentsTiers.Description: Your critical Aimed, Steady and Chimera Shots cause the target to bleed for [@value]% of the damage dealt over [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Trueshot Aura
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the attack power of party and raid members within 100 yards by 5%. Lasts until cancelled.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Barrage
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Multi-Shot and Aimed Shot abilities by [@value2]% and reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while channeling Volley by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Master Marksman
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your critical strike chance with ranged and meele attacks by [@value]%, and reduces the Mana cost of your Steady Shot, Aimed Shot and Chimera Shot by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Rapid Recuperation
TalentsTiers.Description: You gain [@value]% of your mana every [@value2] sec while under the effect of Rapid Fire, and you gain [@value3]% of your mana every [@value4] sec for [@value5] sec when you gain Rapid Killing.

TalentsTiers.Name: Wild Quiver
TalentsTiers.Description: You have a [@value]% chance to shoot an additional shot when doing damage with your auto shot, dealing [@value2]% weapon nature damage. Wild Quiver consumes no ammo.

TalentsTiers.Name: Silencing Shot
TalentsTiers.Description:
5% of base mana
35 yd range

Instant Cast
20 sec cooldown

A shot that deals 50% weapon damage and Silences the target for 3 sec. Non-player victim spellcasting is also interrupted for 3 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Steady Shot
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Steady Shot hits have a [@value]% chance to increase the damage done by your next Aimed Shot, Arcane Shot or Chimera Shot by [@value2]%, and reduce the mana cost of your next Aimed Shot, Arcane Shot or Chimera Shot by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Marked for Death
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your shots and the damage done by your tamed pet's special abilities by [@value]% on market targets, and increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Aimed Shot, Steady Shot, Kill Shot or Chimera Shot by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Chimera Shot
TalentsTiers.Description:
10% of base mana
5-35 yd range

Instant Cast
10 sec cooldown

You deal [@value]% weapon damage, refreshing the current Sting on your target and triggering an effect:

Serpent Sting - Instantly deals [@value2]% of the damage done by your Serpent Sting.

Viper Sting - Instantly restores mana to you equal to [@value3]% of the total amount drained by your Viper Sting.

Scorpid Sting - Attempts to Disarm the target for [@value4] sec. This effect cannot occur more than once per 1 minute.
